content: Use this option if you want to get all data contained in the space as a file.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe a button or option that allows users to download all data from a space as a file. It appears on a settings page and is intended to provide clarity for users navigating manual backup options. The text should help translators understand that this action will export all data from the space, providing context for accessibility and clarity needs.

usage.context:
<StyledManualBackup pageIsDisabled={pageIsDisabled}>
 <StatusMessage message={errorInformation} />
 
 <div className="backup_modules-header_wrapper">
 <Text className="backup_modules-description settings_unavailable">
 {t("ManualBackupDescription")}
 </Text>
 {!isManagement() ? (
 dataBackupUrl ? (
 <Link
 className="link-learn-more"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'الاستضافة' (al-istidafa) translates to 'hosting' and doesn't accurately convey 'space' in the context of a data storage space. A more appropriate term would depend on the specific software/platform, but something like 'المساحة' (al-masaha) - meaning 'the space' - or a more platform-specific term would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: استخدم هذا الخيار إذا كنت تريد الحصول على جميع البيانات الموجودة في المساحة كملف.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses "портала" (portala - the portal) instead of "пространството" (prostranstvoto - the space). The English refers to the 'space,' which is the relevant term in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Използвайте тази опция, ако искате да получите всички данни, съдържащи се в пространството, като файл.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'recibir' (to receive) doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'get' in this context. A more appropriate verb would convey the action of obtaining or downloading the file.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use esta opción si quiere obtener todos los datos del espacio en un archivo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'sivuston' (website's) isn't the most accurate translation of 'space' in this context. 'Space' likely refers to a workspace or area within a larger platform, not a full website. A more appropriate translation might be 'tilassa' (in the space) or a rephrasing to convey the meaning more accurately.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Käytä tätä, jos haluat tallentaa tilan kaiken sisällön tiedostoon.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'tallettaa' implies saving or storing, but 'get' in the English suggests exporting or downloading. While 'tallettaa' isn't entirely wrong, it's not the most precise translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Käytä tätä, jos haluat viedä tilan kaiken sisällön tiedostoon.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "կայքէջում" (kaykejum) which translates to 'website' in the Armenian translation, is not the most accurate representation of 'space' in the English content. 'Space' refers to a container or area within a system, not specifically a website. A better translation would convey the idea of a specific area or location.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Օգտագործեք այս տարբերակը, եթե ցանկանում եք ստանալ տարածքում պարունակվող բոլոր տվյալները որպես ֆայլ:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ປະຕູ' (pratu) translates to 'door' and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'space' in this context. It should refer to the data space or area.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃຊ້ທາງເລືອກນີ້ຖ້າທ່ານຕ້ອງການເອົາຂໍ້ມູນທັງຫມົດທີ່ມີຢູ່ໃນເຂດຂໍ້ມູນເປັນໄຟລ໌. (Use this option if you want to get all data contained in the data area as a file.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ka vēlaties' is not the correct way to express 'if you want'. The correct phrasing would be 'ja vēlaties'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izmantojiet šo iespēju, ja vēlaties visus portāla datus iegūt faila veidā.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Gebruik deze optie als u alle data opgeslagen in de ruimte als bestand wilt ontvangen' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness in Dutch. 'Opgeslagen in de ruimte' is awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gebruik deze optie om alle gegevens in de ruimte als een bestand te exporteren.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'portalu' which implies a specific portal. The original English refers to 'the space', which is more general.  'Portalu' limits the meaning unnecessarily.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Użyj tej opcji, jeśli chcesz pobrać wszystkie dane z przestrzeni jako plik.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'space' in the English content is translated as 'портале' (portal) in Russian. 'Space' in this context likely refers to a specific area or container within the application, not a general portal. A more accurate translation might be something like 'области' (oblast) or 'пространстве' (prostranstve), depending on the precise application terminology.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'space' as 'области' or 'пространстве' to better reflect the intended meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ඔබට අවකාශයේ අඩංගු සියළුම දත්ත ගොනුවක් ලෙස ගැනීමට වුවමනා නම් මෙම විකල්පය භාවිතා කරන්න.' is a literal translation and sounds slightly awkward in Sinhala. While technically correct, it lacks natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබට අවශ්‍ය නම්, සියළු දත්තක් ගොනුවක් ලෙස බා ගත හැකි නම් මෙම විකල්පය භාවිතා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'සියළුම' is a bit redundant.  Using just 'සියළු' would be more concise and natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'සියළුම' with 'සියළු'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Túto možnosť použite, ak chcete získať súbor všetkymi údajmi obsiahnutými v priestore' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Use this option if you want to get all data contained in the space as a file.'. The phrase 'všetkymi údajmi' is awkward and could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Túto možnosť použite, ak chcete exportovať všetky dáta z priestoru do súboru.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'exportovať' is a better fit to convey the 'get as a file' functionality. Using 'získať' is less precise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'získať' with 'exportovať'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'v prostora' is grammatically incorrect. It should be 'v prostoru'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: v prostoru

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Користите ову опцију ако желите да сви подаци буду садржани у простору као датотека' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Use this option if you want to get all data contained in the space as a file.'. The phrasing 'буду садржани у простору' sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Користите ову опцију ако желите да извезете све податке из простора у датотеку.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'простору' (space) is accurate but 'извезете' (export) might be a better choice than 'буду садржани' to convey the meaning of getting all data as a file.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'извезете' instead of 'буду садржани'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Koristite ovu opciju ako želite da svi podaci budu sadržani u prostoru kao datoteka.' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness in Serbian. The phrasing 'budu sadržani u prostoru' sounds awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'budu izvezeni kao datoteka' or 'se nalaze u datoteci'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Koristite ovu opciju ako želite da svi podaci budu izvezeni kao datoteka.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'portal' ('порталі') doesn't accurately reflect the English 'space'. It implies a broader online platform rather than a specific area or workspace within a system.  'Простір' (prostir) or 'область' (oblast') would be more suitable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Використовуйте цю опцію, якщо ви хочете отримати всі дані, що містяться в просторі як файл.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Sử dụng tùy chọn này nếu bạn muốn lấy tất cả dữ liệu chứa trên không gian này dưới một tập tin." is not the most natural or precise translation of "Use this option if you want to get all data contained in the space as a file." The phrase "chứa trên không gian này" is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would imply 'within' or 'of' the space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sử dụng tùy chọn này nếu bạn muốn lấy tất cả dữ liệu trong không gian này dưới dạng một tập tin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "如果要将协作空间中包含的所有数据作为文件获取，请使用此选项" is a bit verbose and doesn't quite capture the succinctness of the English. While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing for a user interface.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 考虑使用更简洁的表达，例如：'使用此选项将协作空间中的所有数据导出为文件。' (Use this option to export all data in the collaboration space as a file.)
